class.name: StoreProductPurchaseOption
class.brief_description: Represents an option that can be supplied when purchasing a [StoreProduct].
class.description: You create instances of this class and you can pass those to [method StoreKitManager.purchase_with_options].

method.name: app_account_token
method.description: Creates a purchase option with an app account token. This token should be a UUID string that associates the transaction with a user account on your service.

method.name: introductory_offer_elligibility
method.description: Creates a purchase option with a specific introductory offer eligibility. This requires the signed JWS string from the App Store.

method.name: quantity
method.description: Creates a purchase option specifying the quantity of the product to purchase.

method.name: simulate_ask_to_buy_in_sandbox
method.description: Creates a purchase option to simulate the "Ask to Buy" flow in the sandbox environment.

method.name: win_back_offer
method.description: Creates a purchase option for a win-back offer.
